 Transformations performed:

 * Sketching (sketcher) -> Style: 2 | Lineweight: 3 | Contrast: 20 | Shadow: 0.877245790557936 | Gain: 0.410025997785851 
 * Median (magick) -> Pixels: 48 
 * Modulation (magick) -> Brightness: 137 | Saturation: 91 | Hue: 166 
 * Quantize (magick) -> Max Colors in Image: 15
